Usage

Introduction

this function used to create schema, when you create your connection if your schema there was not , code will auto create a schema

Create schema

import dorsa_Database
from dorsa_Database import dataBase

db = dataBase('__user_name','__password','__localhost','__schema_name__')

db.create_schema('__schema_name__')
